P.title: Will China reduce their carbon emissions per GDP by 60% by 2030?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes China meets its primary 2030 climate action goals of cutting emissions intensity by at least 60% below 2005 levels on or before January 1, 2030, according to expert analysis independent of the Chinese government

Q.title: Will China reduce their carbon emissions per GDP by 60% by 2030?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes China meets its primary 2030 climate action goals of cutting emissions intensity by at least 60% below 2005 levels on or before January 1, 2030, according to expert analysis independent of the Chinese government

P_and_Q.title: Will China reduce their carbon emissions per GDP by 60% by 2030 AND will there be a Vegan Country by 2100?
P_and_Q.body: Resolves YES if China meets its primary 2030 climate action goals of cutting emissions intensity by at least 60% below 2005 levels on or before January 1, 2030, according to expert analysis independent of the Chinese government AND there is at least one country by 2100 that bans the consumption of all animal products as defined in the resolution criteria. Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: Will the European Union meet its 2030 targets under the Paris Climate Treaty?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if a credible news report cites an analysis independent of the European Union government confirming that Europe has met all three 2030 climate action goals, including emission reduction by at least 40% below 1990 levels, on or before January 1, 2030.
Fine Print
The EU has updated its goals under the Paris Agreement, but this question will use the original goals in place at the time the question was written, specifically the three below.
40% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions by 2030, compared to 2019
At least 27% of total energy consumption from renewable energy
At least 27% increase in energy efficiency in comparison with projections

Q.title: Will the European Union meet its 2030 targets under the Paris Climate Treaty?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if a credible news report cites an analysis independent of the European Union government confirming that Europe has met all three 2030 climate action goals, including emission reduction by at least 40% below 1990 levels, on or before January 1, 2030.
Fine Print
The EU has updated its goals under the Paris Agreement, but this question will use the original goals in place at the time the question was written, specifically the three below.
40% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions by 2030, compared to 2019
At least 27% of total energy consumption from renewable energy
At least 27% increase in energy efficiency in comparison with projections

P_and_Q.title: Will the European Union meet its 2030 climate targets AND will Metaculus exist in 2030?
P_and_Q.body: Resolves YES if a credible news report confirms that Europe has met all three 2030 climate action goals AND there is continuity with the current version of Metaculus with minimal data loss by 2030. Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: Will any of Belgium, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and/or Germany leave the EU before 2027?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, before January 1, 2027, one or more of Belgium, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and/or Germany triggers Article 50 of the Treaty of Lisbon by notifying the European Council of its intention to leave the union.
It also resolves as positive if by the same deadline the entity called European Union has dissolved completely or dissolved to create a new politico-economic union of some European nations under a different name

Q.title: Will any of Belgium, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and/or Germany leave the EU before 2027?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, before January 1, 2027, one or more of Belgium, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and/or Germany triggers Article 50 of the Treaty of Lisbon by notifying the European Council of its intention to leave the union.
It also resolves as positive if by the same deadline the entity called European Union has dissolved completely or dissolved to create a new politico-economic union of some European nations under a different name

P_and_Q.title: Will any of the mentioned countries leave the EU or the EU dissolve AND will we reach the island of stability by 2050?
P_and_Q.body: Resolves YES if before January 1, 2027, one or more of Belgium, France, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and/or Germany triggers Article 50 of the Treaty of Lisbon OR the European Union dissolves completely or dissolves to create a new politico-economic union of some European nations under a different name AND we create an isotope of an element with more than 110 protons that has a half-life of at least one day prior to 2050, verified by an independent scientific team. Resolves NO otherwise.
